creditline: Anonymous gift in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Art
description:
one silver CD-R disc in one green jewel case; 4 ambient videos, looped

untitled [four part video polyptych]
disc says "C 2014 JoAnn Verburg. Do not make unauthorized copies. Untitled (so far). 4 Fonti Grasses videos- to loop to show- to return all copies"

video shown on four screens oriented vertically; images of a flowing body of water with vegetation
title: GRASSES (Fonti del Clittuno)
